Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: One of the worst dining experiences in a long time. The staff is incredibly rude and unprofessional, the food is quite overpriced and the portions ridiculously small. There is really nothing good to say about this place. I recommend avoiding it.

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Wonderful glass walls connect this museum cafe with the outdoors. Attentive service and speedy kitchen makes a coffee, snack or meal a welcome break from touring any of cultural institutions that front the Museumplein.

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Reasonable place to hang out and have drinks & small bites. The menu is quite standard - primarily typical dutch cusine with exception of the risotto, which is quite good (the one with pumkin). Some variety in coctails and a happy hour on the gin-tonic (but includes 'bitterballen' which are quite disgusting)

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Very tasty food and nice service. The place was crowded and things took a little time but the personell was so polite and apologizing for delays. We really liked the place.

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Really bad service and the coffee man wanted to bit me when I urge them to give us the bill. Don't go there if you want to have good mood before getting to van gough museum.

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Worst tourist trap ever. I feel ashamed to be an Amsterdam citizen.  Horrible value for money and the worst service in the city. Simply don't go here, plenty of alternatives to be found nearby!

Name: Restaurant Stedelijk
Review Text: Nice food, a little on the light side quantity-wise but tasty. Expensive but normally so considering the place. Ideal for a snack after a couple of hours with contemporary art

Review Text:

Review Text: Tragic experience. I was served Austrian Riesling, and Guinea fowl instead of beef steak. Horrible service, avoid it.
